title: Lf You Want To See
lyrics:
lf you want to see
The glory of the Lord,
Why don't you praise Him
Lift up your hands and praise Him,
lf you want to see
The glory of the Lord,
Why don't you lift up your hands
And praise the Lord,
O praise Him in the morning,
Praise Him in the noon time,
Praise Him in the evening,
O praise Him all the day long,
Lift up your hands
And praise the Lord.
